TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Prompt extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 可以呈现的内容（文本或音频文件）的相关信息。

span.span: Represents information about what can be rendered, either text or an audio file, by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象可以包含纯文本，文本标记语言或音频文件格式。A object can contain plain text, text formatted with markup language, or audio files. 一个空对象创建的每个新实例。An empty object is created with each new instance of . 类提供了方法，用于添加内容，包括文本、 SSML 标记、 书签和预先录制的音频文件 （如.wav 文件），到空它所包含的对象。The class provides methods for adding content, including text, SSML markup, bookmarks, and prerecorded audio files (such as .wav files), to the empty object that it contains. 通常，应用程序将使用，而非对象，若要创建提示并填充其内容。Typically, applications will use , rather than a object, to create prompts and populate them with content. 若要生成的内容的语音对象，请使用方法。To generate speech from the contents of a object, use the method.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class from a object.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies the text to be spoken and whether its format is plain text or markup language.
